From my character background, being a Facchino means dealing with physical transportation of goods through the harbor. This dock area seems relevant for our proximity-based interaction according to relationship mechanics.Looking at my relationship tracker template, I should focus on practical conversation starters about work or nearby opportunities. I recall from game mechanics that Facchini gain TrustScore through handling valuable goods - this could explain why Bartolomeo chooses to talk business here rather than personal matters.The response needs to balance authenticity with strategic thinking: maintain my simple working-class persona while subtly demonstrating efficiency, which might impress Lorenzo's higher social class.</think>Ah, signore Lorenzo. Si sta soffermando per il caldo? Ho portato una cesta di frutta fresca dalla Giudea — pagherà generosamente con $COMPUTE.I vedo che lavori per la Dogana dei Francesi qui vicino. Forse potremmo esplorare nuove rotte commerciali insieme, signore?
